title: Outage Leads to Credit and Upsell
description: A customer calls about a service outage. After resolving, the agent identifies they are a good candidate for a higher-tier plan with better reliability.

tasks.description: Handle the initial outage report by checking the network status and providing an ETR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully handles the service outage part of the call.

tasks.description: Proactively apply a service credit for the downtime.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a credit without the customer having to ask.

tasks.description: Review the customer's account and propose an upgrade to a business-tier plan with an SLA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pivots to a sales conversation and explains the benefits of a business plan.
